title: Club can print Life Insurance section
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has created a new non-first year contract
custom_steps:
WHEN user enters a Life Insurance section
AND clicks 'print'
custom_expected:
THEN Life Insurance Consent should generate and print as it was entered into EBIS
AND data appears as it was entered into EBIS
AND the layout and behavior follow the template and report details
AND any fields not filled out should print blank

title: Club can print the execution page of the contract
custom_preconds:
Link to Template: https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req#/items/2347096?projectId=14044
Link to Sample: https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req#/items/2347185?projectId=14044
Li​nk to Report details: https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req#/items/2347095?projectId=14044
custom_steps: WHEN user hits Print
custom_expected:
THEN all behavior listed in Report Details for Execution of Contract should be met except for any E-sig related notes, parental consent and commissioners stamping
AND data on printed Execution of Contract should match with what was entered into EBIS.
AND the Execution of Contract should be laid out as shown in the template.
AND any fields not yet filled out in ebis should just print blank on the PDF
AND ff English only, then it should fit on one page.  
AND there should be space left for Commissioner's stamp section at the bottom of the page.
AND any changes made to the contract by club/BOC any state should reflect the changes in the PDF when you hit PRINT again

title: As a club, I want SSN number to print on Add C
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has created a new non-first year contract
and has created an addendum C
custom_steps:
WHEN User adds a SSN onto player profile

OR

WHEN Player does not have a SSN on player profile
custom_expected:
THEN SSN appears on printed addendum C

OR 

THEN SSN appears as "none" on printed addendum C

title: As BOC, I want to send a TA or Pre-approved 1st yr dom contract back to club for updating
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is a BOC user
custom_steps:
WHEN the 1st yr domestic contract is in a state of Terms Accepted or Pre-Approved
AND selecting  "Return to Club"
custom_expected:
THEN move the contract state to "Update Terms Accepted"
AND Clubs get an action item

title: As BOC I want pending active entry removed if signing date is before terms submitted at time of approval
custom_preconds:
GIVEN player has status of pending active
AND their contract contains a signing date before the terms submitted date
custom_steps: WHEN the user approves the contract
custom_expected: THEN pending entry hidden

title: As BOC, I want to reattach and re-stamp a PDF to an approved Contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN User is on an approved minor contract
custom_steps:
WHEN User removes attachment on minor contract
AND Adds a new attachment
AND Labels contract
AND Clicks Save
custom_expected:
THEN Minor contract gets a re-stamped by BOC
AND Original date of approval is with the re-stamp

title: As BOC I can see rule checks fire on accepting terms on 1st year domestic contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is a BOC user
custom_steps: WHEN Pre-Approving a 1st year domestic Contract
custom_expected:
THEN all required field rules should run
All rules that are warning for BOC should be overridden
BUT clubs will get blockers

title: As BOC I want to see rule checks fire on pre approving 1st year domestic contract
As BOC I can accept terms on a first year domestic contract
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is a BOC user 
AND there is a first year domestic contract on the BOC clipboard
custom_steps:
WHEN BOC user opens the Terms Submitted Contract from either the Clipboard or Contract History
AND clicks "Accept Terms"
custom_expected:
THEN Contract reloads with updated status in view mode
AND Status header updates to green "Accepted" state with "Terms Accepted" shown underneath
AND Status and Dates section updates "Status Last Changed" and "Changed by " fields
AND Show blue notification "Contract Terms Accepted successfully"

title: As BOC, I want the player to get added to the roster when I accept terms on his 1st yr dom contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is a BOC user
custom_steps:
WHEN the player does not already have a roster status, and if the Beginning in Year = current year
OR the player does not already have a roster status, and if the Beginning in Year = next year
custom_expected:
THEN when the Contract reaches "Terms Accepted" State, set player's current MN roster status to "Pending Active"
OR  when the Contract reaches "Terms Accepted" State, set player's current MN roster status to "Signed for Next Year"
AND in both cases, also set the player’s current org and club to destination org and club (selected in Addendum A)
AND In both cases, set player's level of play to the destination club's level.

title: As club/BOC, I want the contract to appear in Player history when 1st yr dom contract terms are accepted
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is a Club or BOC user
AND is on a Player's Player History
custom_steps: WHEN a contract is terms accepted
custom_expected:
THEN create entry in Player History where date = Player's signing date, Code = Min Cont and Desc = Signed a Minor League Contract for [Number of Seasons] years. Signing Bonus: [Signing bonus value]. This should be in green font.
AND If player was signed for next year, create another entry in Player history immediately after with date = Player's signing date, Code = SGNXT and Desc=Sign for Following Season. This is in black font
AND If player was made pending active, create an entry in Player history with date = Terms submitted date, Code = Min Contract and Description = Player added to roster as Pending Active. This is in black font

title: As BOC, I want the player to become a professional player when I accept contract terms
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is a BOC user
custom_steps:
WHEN a player is not a pro player
AND has a 1st yr dom contract with Terms Accepted
custom_expected:
THEN player becomes a pro player
AND is searchable using quick search and Advanced search for pro players
AND The Pro player profile is populated with information available from the amateur profile and must look and feel like other pro player profiles
AND The domestic profile continues to exist

title: As BOC, I want 1st yr domestic player's roster status to become "Active" on approving his contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is a BOC user
custom_steps:
WHEN a player is NOT signed for next year
AND player's roster status is currently Pending Active
custom_expected:
THEN when the Contract reaches "Approved" State, set player's current roster status to "Active"
AND this transaction should be dated the date of contract signing date
AND the Contract entry in Player History is now in black font
AND if a pending active player history entry existed and signing date is before it, remove the pending active entry

title: As club/BOC, I want to be stopped if my Contingency bonus amount is not under the maximum
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is a Club or BOC user
custom_steps:
WHEN selecting Contingency Bonus
AND bonus amount is NOT less than or equal to the maximum amount allowed - currently $2500
custom_expected: THEN show hard error to club and warning for BOC on Submit, "The Contingency Bonus amount cannot be more than $2500"

title: As BOC, I want to pre-approve a 1st yr dom contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is a BOC user
custom_steps:
WHEN there is a 1st yr dom contract
AND opening a Terms Accepted Contract from the Clipboard or from Contract History
AND clicking the "Pre-approve" button
custom_expected:
THEN change the state of the Contract to "Pre-approved"
AND Contract should be removed from Clipboard once the state changes
AND Status header stays in green "Accepted" state with "Pre-approved" shown underneath
AND Status and Dates section updates "Status Last Changed" and "Changed by " fields
AND Show blue notification "Contract Pre-approved successfully"
AND The contract is still fully editable to BOC in this state

title: As BOC I want to update the players draft record when his contract is TA
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is a BOC user
custom_steps:
WHEN player gets added to roster
AND the player has been through the most recent draft (R4 status = drafted)
custom_expected: THEN remove the player's "Pending Eligible" or "Eligible" record for the following draft year

title: As BOC, I want to see 1 st yr dom contracts on the MNC verification widget
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is a BOC user
custom_steps: WHEN a 1st yr dom contracts is pre-approved
custom_expected:
THEN on the MNC verification widget with the type as "First year Domestic"
AND the "R" column is populated with the Round that player was drafted in
AND the "Ovr" column is populated with the overall pick number player was drafted in
AND all other columns are populated except for MJ Base Salary which is not applicable

title: As BOC, I want to approve a 1st yr dom contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is a BOC user
custom_steps:
WHEN there is a 1st yr dom contract
AND its in a Pre-approved Contract
custom_expected:
THEN can approve a contract from MNC verification widget
AND club gets a notification
AND capture the approval time and pre-approver ID
AND BOC signature is stamped on contract

title: As BOC, I want to reattach and re-stamp a PDF to an approved 1st yr dom Contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is a BOC user
custom_steps: WHEN 1st yr dom Contract is in approved state
custom_expected:
THEN In situations where no existing "Contract" labelled file exists, If BOC adds a new file and labels it "Contract", on saving, restamp file with BOC signature
AND If existing "Contract" labelled file exists, BOC can still delete it, and reattach a  file, and relabel it "Contract". Then on saving, restamp with BOC signature
AND In both situations, the approval date printed on the "Contract" must be the original date of approval as captured in the status and dates section
AND If stamping fails, show error ""Contract could not be stamped. Please contact BOC".

title: As BOC, I want to reattach and re-stamp a PDF to an approved Add C
custom_preconds: GIVEN User is viewing an approved addendum C
custom_steps:
WHEN User selects trash can on attachment
AND User attaches a new pdf
AND Selects Addendum C option
AND Clicks Save
custom_expected:
THEN Addendum C is saved
AND Attachment receives new BOC Stamp
AND Original date approved is on new attachment

title: As a user  I want to see draft informaton on amateur profiles
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is a Club user
custom_steps: WHEN on a Domestic Ameateur profile
custom_expected: THEN user can see Draft information

title: UAT feedback: Contract status on Contracts to show how a contract was terminated
custom_preconds: GIVEN there is a Contract
custom_steps: WHEN a Release transaction auto-terminates a contract
custom_expected:
THEN add a field to the Status and Dates section of the contract
AND Label: Reason for Termination, Populate with: Terminated as per MN Release

title: UAT feedback: As BOC, I want to reattach and re-stamp a PDF to an approved Add C
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is a BOC user
AND an ADD C is in an approved state
custom_steps:
WHEN a BOC user can edit attached files section 
AND In there is no existing ADD C labelled file exists
custom_expected:
THEN If BOC adds a new file and labels it Add C, on saving, restamp file with BOC signature
BUT If existing Add C labelled file exists, BOC can still delete it, and reattach a  file, and relabel it Add C
AND In both situations, the approval date printed on the Add C must be the original date of approval as captured in the status and dates section
AND If stamping fails, show error ""Addendum C could not be stamped. Please contact BOC".

title: As BOC, I want to search for 1st yr domestic contracts
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is a BOC user
AND is on the Advanced Search widget
custom_steps:
WHEN search for is Minor Contract
AND Filters is Contract Type
AND First Year Domestic is an option
AND clicking Search
custom_expected: THEN First Year Domestic will populate in Results.

title: As a club, I want to be able to process Addendum C's twice as fast as currently possible
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is a club user
custom_steps: WHEN processing an ADD C
custom_expected: THEN depending on the state of transaction will process based on the times supplied in the AC in the story

title: As a club, I want to create a new first year domestic contract
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is a Club user
AND the player does NOT have a single contract that is "Terms Submitted" or higher
custom_steps: WHEN user hits Create New,
custom_expected: THEN a new contract is created with label "Domestic First-Year" instead of Non 1st yr

title: As a club/ BOC, I want to submit Terms on my 1st yr domestic contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is a CLUB or BOC user
custom_steps:
WHEN there is a 1st yr domestic contract
AND clicking submit to Terms Submitted
custom_expected:
THEN show blue notification when status is successfully updated "Contract terms submitted successfully"
AND Update status header to show Terms Submitted in green
AND Update 'Status Last changed, Changed by, Date Submitted and Submitted by' fields in the Status and Dates section

title: As a club, I can edit and keep track of my terms submitted and Terms accepted contracts
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is a Club user 
AND there is an existing Contract is on the Club's Pending approvals widget
custom_steps:
WHEN the Contract is in Terms submitted and Terms Accepted state
AND the user hits Edit
custom_expected:
THEN the user can continue to edit certain fields (See See #115866183, #115975199 and #114685483.)
AND can update Parental consent location signed field
BUT TAC is visible to other clubs except for certain sections (See #111625804 and #119050525)

title: As a club, I want to enter a Dual Sport Language clause
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is a Club user
AND has a First Year Domestic contract
custom_steps: WHEN in the Addendum B - 1st yr section
custom_expected:
THEN Add the Dual Sport Language clause. 
AND All fields on this clause and their associated behavior should be added
AND Either this or a Signing Bonus can be given to a player
BUT not both: If user toggles this YES, Signing Bonus should be auto- toggled to NO and vice-versa

title: As a Club, I want to enter Parental consent information for my player
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is a Club user
custom_steps:
WHEN under Execution of Contract
AND the player is less than the age of 22 as of time of contract creation
custom_expected:
THEN add a parental Consent sub-section into the Execution of Contract section 
AND Options in the 'Parental/Guardian Consent" dropdown are
- Mother
- Father
- Guardian
- Both
- Other

title: As a club, I want to view errors on creating a 1st yr dom contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is a Club user
custom_steps: WHEN creating a 1st yr dom contract
custom_expected:
THEN it will check for errors
AND if creating more than one preliminary contract for the same player then a hard error will display "A preliminary minor league contract already exists for this player"
AND If player's home or Birth country is Taiwan, Japan or South Korea, show ignore warning to club "This player may require an active Asian Status Check before you can create a new contract." **Hint:** Please contact BOC for details

title: As a club, I want to enter a contingency bonus clause
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is a Club user
custom_steps:
WHEN on a First Yr Dom Contract
AND in the Addendum B section
custom_expected:
THEN can add the Contingency Bonus clause
AND user can add additional rows. 
AND user can delete added rows but cannot remove the first row.
AND Required fields should have asterisks
AND Date fields and number fields should not allow invalid values
AND Number field should auto-add commas
AND Standard and Custom language options should be supported
AND Standard languages are viewable through the language viewer
AND Toggle and trash can global functionality should be working

title: As a club, I want to enter a College Scholarship Clause
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is a club user
AND On a 1st yr contract
custom_steps: WHEN in the Add B section
custom_expected:
THEN can add the college scholarship clause
AND Required fields should have asterisks
AND Date fields and number fields should not allow invalid values
AND Number field should auto-add commas
AND Standard and Custom language options should be supported
AND Standard languages are viewable through the language viewer
AND Toggle and trash can global functionality should be working

title: As a club, I want to enter an Incentive Bonus Clause
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is a Club user
AND in a 1st yr dom contract
custom_steps: WHEN on the ADD B
custom_expected:
THEN user can add the Incentive Bonus clause (language selection only)
AND Required fields should have asterisks
AND Standard and Custom language options should be supported
AND Standard languages are viewable through the language viewer
AND Toggle and trash can global functionality should be working

title: As BOC, I want to create a first year domestic contract on behalf of club
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is a BOC user
custom_steps: WHEN creating a first year domestic contract on behalf of a club
custom_expected:
THEN BOC can change the Org to any Org. 
AND BOC can attach files in preliminary
AND BOC can add BOC notes
AND All other functionality stays the same as Club

title: As Club/ BOC, I want to delete a contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is a Club or BOC user
custom_steps:
WHEN there is a  1st yr dom contract in Preliminary state
AND clicking delete button
custom_expected:
THEN all associated attachments should also get deleted
AND The contract is no longer available through Contract History. 
AND User is taken back to where ever the "Close" button would have taken them.

title: As a club, I want to see what the player was signed as when creating 1st yr dom contracts
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is a Club user
custom_steps: WHEN on a 1st yr dom contract
custom_expected: THEN the Signed As field will be populated with the draft status of the player at time of creation (eg. drafted, passed over, etc)

title: As a club, I want to be stopped if player is not passed over or drafted by my club
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is a Club user
AND if amateur player's R4 status = Drafted and player was drafted in most recent draft, only the club that drafted him can create a contract
custom_steps:
THEN Business rule 3.4.1 Must be run on Create as a hard error for Clubs
AND if amateur player's R4 status = Drafted and player was drafted in most recent draft, only the club that drafted him can create a contract
AND if an amateur player has a 'passed over' R4 status, then any club can create a contract for him
custom_expected:
THEN If neither condition is met or player has a different R4 status, show error:
"You do not have permission to create a contract for this player. If you believe you have received this message in error, please contact the BOC. "

title: As a user I want to be stopped if player requires parental consent
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is a Club or BOC user
custom_steps:
WHEN checking the signing date entered into ADD A
AND any of the following conditions are met:
- If player’s home address is Puerto Rico
AND player is under 21 as of the contract signing date
OR
- If player’s home address is Canada
AND player is under 19 as of the contract signing date
OR
- If player’s home address is Alabama, USA
AND player is under 19 as of the contract signing date
OR
- If the player is under 18 as of the contract signing date
AND his home address is NOT Puerto Rico, Canada or Alabama USA
custom_expected:
THEN the Parental Guardian Consent field (in Execution of Contract section) gets a red asterisk (only this one field, not the other 3)
AND if signing date is updated, then hide or show the asterisk accordingly.
AND if the field is required but not populated, then on Submit, show hard error to clubs and over ride to BOC onSubmit "This player requires Parental/Guardian Consent. Please complete this field to continue"

title: As club/ BOC, I want to view over-rideable warnings when submitting a 1st yr dom contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is a Club or BOC user
custom_steps: WHEN the user submits terms for a 1st yr dom contract,
custom_expected:
THEN run the following rule checks as WARNINGs for both club and BOC
#114124361
#114124419
#114124777
(see Pivotal Story)

title: As BOC, I want to return a 1st yr domestic contract to a club
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is a BOC user
custom_steps:
WHEN there is a 1st yr dom contract
AND The "Return to club" button drown option is available to the BOC in Terms Submitted state
AND if "Return to club" is selected
custom_expected:
THEN the contract is moved back to "Preliminary" state.
AND Show Blue notification "Contract has been returned to Preliminary"
AND Contract History shows contract in red font again
AND Page reloads in view mode after status change
AND all Club admins for the club that player is signing with, will receive a notification in the Club notification widget

title: As club/ BOC, I want to be stopped from signing a player on the NES list
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is a CLUB or BOC user
custom_steps:
WHEN a player is on the NES list 
AND on Create or Submit for First yr dom contract
custom_expected: THEN error will show "This player cannot be signed because he is on the Not Eligible to Sign list"

title: As club/ BOC, I want to be stopped from signing a first yr dom contract during  the Rule 4 signing closed period
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is a Club or BOC user
custom_steps:
WHEN Signing date must not be on or within 'Rule 4 Signing Closed Period Start' (Set in system dates) and 'Rule 4 Draft' (set in System dates).
AND on Submit
custom_expected:
THEN the error will display "The Signing date for a Rule 4 player cannot be during the Rule 4 Signing Closed period."
**Hint:**Closed Period from [Rule 4 Signing closed period start] to [Rule 4 Draft]"

title: As a club/ BOC, I want to be stopped if my dual sport bonus payment dates are before the signing date
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is a CLUB or BOC user
AND on a 1st yr Dom Contract in Add B
custom_steps: WHEN Dual Sport bonus payments dates are before the contract signing date
custom_expected: THEN the error will display "The Dual Sport bonus payment date cannot occur before the contract Signing Date"

title: As Club/BOC, I want to be stopped if I don't pay the minimum salary scale for ASl, DSl, VSL
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is a Club or BOC user
AND on a First Year Domestic Contracts
custom_steps:
WHEN the salaries entered must be between $500 and $1100 for ASL, DSL, VSL
AND on Submit
custom_expected: THEN if rule fails the error displays "The salary for level(s) of play [level(s) of play] must be between $[lowest required amount] and $[highest allowable amount] for a first year contract"

title: As club/BOC, I want to be stopped if College scholarship awards are not limited to 8 semesters or 12 quarters
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is a Club or BOC user
custom_steps:
WHEN a college scholarship exists, Cannot enter more than 8 semesters or more than 12 quarters
AND on Submit
custom_expected: THEN if rule fails then show error "There cannot be more than 8 semesters or 12 quarters for the College Scholarship Plan"

title: As a Club, I want to be stopped from submitting contract if player is missing National ID #
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is a CLUB user
custom_steps:
WHEN player is from US or Peurto Rico, player must have a SSN entered on player profile
AND If player is from Venezuela, he must have a Cedula number
AND on Submit
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be stopped from submitting contract
AND the error will display "This player is from [home country name]. You must enter a [SSN / Cedula number] before this contract can be submitted."

title: As a club/ BOC, I want to be stopped if all dual sport bonus payments are not within 5 years
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is a Club or BOC user
AND in Addendum B of First Year Contract
custom_steps:
WHEN dual sport has been selected, ensure Payment Dates (if any) are not more than 5 years in the future
AND if rule fails on submit
custom_expected: THEN the error will display "The Dual Sport bonus payment date cannot occur more than 5 years after the Signing Date"

title: As Club/BOC I want to see hard errors on submitting a 1st year domestic contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is a Club or BOC user
custom_steps: WHEN submitting a 1st yr dom contract,
custom_expected:
THEN run the following rule checks as HARD errors for CLUB and WARNINGs for BOC
#114124281
#114124543
#114124911
#114124953
#114125177
Also run rule 19.2 - Salary in Add C is required field for player's level of play entered in Addendum A
(see Pivotal Story)

title: As a user, I want to be stopped if required fields are missing on my contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is a Club or BOC user
custom_steps:
WHEN on 1st yr dom contracts
AND on Submit
custom_expected:
THEN if the following stories are met
#115941543
#113667529
#114125733
AND Errors/warnings should trigger the global error modal
AND Errors/warnings should be pinned to the browser after dismissing the error modal
AND Missed required fields should be outlined in red

title: As club/ BOC, I want to be stopped if signing a player after the R4 signing deadline unless he is Not subject to deadline
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is a Club or BOC user
custom_steps:
WHEN the Signing Date for a drafted player cannot be after 'Rule 4 Draft Signing Deadline' as set in the System Values screen, unless player is marked as Not subject to Deadline
AND on Submit if rule fails
custom_expected: THEN the error will display "You cannot submit this contract as the Signing Date is past the Rule 4 Draft Signing Deadline [value from system values]. **Hint:**Please contact the BOC"

title: As club/BOC, I want to be stopped if Contingency bonus > days retained is not under the maximum
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is a CLUB or BOC user
custom_steps:
WHEN Contingency Bonus has been selected, Ensure days retained is less than or equal to the maximum amount allowed - currently 90 days
AND on Submit, if Rule fails
custom_expected: THEN the error displays "The number of Days Retained to qualify for the Contingency Bonus cannot be more than 90"

title: As a user, I want to see Ebis 1 contracts in Ebis 2 contract history
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is a CLUB or BOC user
custom_steps: WHEN looking at Ebis 2 Contract History
custom_expected:
THEN All Non-1st year contract entries that are viewable in ebis 1, should appear in the Contract History of ebis 2
AND When contracts are brought over, they should be converted to the following states:
Preliminary > Preliminary
Submit to Club > Preliminary
Submit Terms > Terms Submitted
Terms Accepted > Terms Accepted
Reject Terms > Preliminary
Pre-approved > Pre-approved
Reject Accepted > Rejected
Withdrawn > Withdrawn
Approved > Approved
Update Approved > Approved
Expired > Expired
Terminated > Terminated
Voided > Voided

title: As a user, I want to see 1st year domestic contracts from Ebis1 > Ebis 2
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is a CLUB or BOC user
custom_steps: WHEN on 1st yr Dom contracts in Ebis 2
custom_expected:
THEN All 1st yr dom contracts from ebis 1 should correctly appear in Player history in ebis 2
AND When ebis 1 contracts are opened, they should display correctly in ebis 2
AND Attachments from ebis 1 should show on ebis 2
AND Addendum Cs are formatted correctly
AND Ebis 1 Contract states are correctly translated into ebis 2 states

title: As BOC I can void a 1st year dom contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is a BOC user
custom_steps: WHEN on a 1st yr dom contract
custom_expected:
THEN BOC can void the contract, See #117957143
AND BOC can enter reasons for voiding #117957303
AND All transactions are reversed. See #117957347

title: As BOC I can reject a 1st year dom contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is a BOC user
custom_steps: WHEN on a 1st yr dom contract
custom_expected:
THEN BOC can reject a TA or Preapproved contract. See #117068003 and #117069063
AND BOC can enter why contract was rejected #117068025
AND Player is taken off the roster and his transactions are reversed. See #117068389
AND BOC can delete a rejected contract #119051403

title: As BOC I can withdraw a 1st year dom contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is a BOC user
custom_steps: WHEN on a 1st yr dom contract
custom_expected:
THEN BOC can withdraw a TA or Preapproved contract. See #117068791 and #117069099
AND Player is removed from roster and his TX are reversed. See #117068815
AND BOC can delete a withdrawn contract. See #119051403

title: As BOC, I want 1st yr dom contracts to automatically expire or terminate when player is no longer with the club
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is a BOC user
custom_steps: WHEN 1st yr dom contracts to automatically expire or terminate when player is no longer with the club
custom_expected:
THEN If player becomes a free agent, automatically expire his MN Contract. See #117957111
AND When player is released, automatically terminate his contract. See #117957403

title: As BOC, I want to withdraw a pre-approved contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is a BOC user
custom_steps: WHEN on a 1st yr dom contract
custom_expected: THEN All Acceptance Criteria in #117068791 should be met except that the state change is from Pre-approved > Withdrawn

title: As BOC, I want the player to get taken off the Roster if his contract for this season is rejected
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is a BOC user
custom_steps:
WHEN BOC rejects contract,
AND The over-ride warning should list all Transactions that occurred to that player going back to the "Sign to Roster" transaction that added the player to the Roster when the contract was terms accepted (dated the Terms submitted date)
custom_expected:
THEN show an over-rideable warning
AND The following transactions will be reversed [Bullet] [Date of TX] - [TX name]
AND update the state of contract and reverse all mentioned transactions up to and including the Sign to Roster transaction
AND All reversed transactions are now hidden in player history entry including the entry "Player added to roster as Pending Active".
AND The Player history entry around the Contract signing now has "Rejected: " in front of it
AND Player's Roster status and club returns to what it was prior to signing
